Title: 7 Days in Hell
Actors: Andy Samberg, Kit Harington, Fred Armisen, David Copperfield
Plot: A "documentary" on the rivalry between an American tennis player, Aaron Williams (played by Andy Samberg), and an English tennis player, Charles Poole (Kit Harrington, of Game of Thrones fame). Focuses largely on the match where their rivalry reached a climax - Wimbledon 2001, 1st round - a match that took seven days...
